name: CISCOROneSource
0:
”Alexa, tell the care givers I need assistance.”
”Alexa, ask the care givers to send help.”
”Alexa, tell the care givers to cancel the call.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: care givers
des: If you live in a community with a OneSource call system, you can easily call for care giver assistance using Alexa. Just notify the staff that you want to link your Alexa device to the OneSource system. They will provide you with an account code that you can use to link your device. Once linked, you can call for assistance by saying, "Alexa, tell the care givers I need assistance."
